		<maven.javadoc.failOnError>false</maven.javadoc.failOnError>

	</properties>

	<!-- everyone needs junit -->
	<dependencies>

		</dependency>
	</dependencies>

	<build>

				<artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
				<version>3.1</version>
				<configuration>
					<source>1.8</source>
					<target>1.8</target>
				</configuration>
			</plugin>

			<!-- TODO: will have to redo the git.baseurl stuff if release plugin is to work -->
			<!-- CONSIDER: may want versions-maven-plugin to help change SNAPSHOT

			<!-- mvn -B release:clean release:prepare release:perform -->
			<plugin>
				<groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
				<artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
				<version>2.5.3</version>
				<configuration>
					<!-- its release profile runs javadoc generation which can fail -->
					<useReleaseProfile>false</useReleaseProfile>
				</configuration>
			</plugin>

			<!-- mvn clean compile assembly:single -->
			<plugin>
				<artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
				<configuration>
					<descriptorRefs>
						<descriptorRef>jar-with-dependencies</descriptorRef>
					</descriptorRefs>
				</configuration>
				<!-- don't want to execute by default <executions> <execution> <id>make-assembly</id> 
					<phase>package</phase> <goals> <goal>single</goal> </goals> </execution> 
					</executions> -->
			</plugin>
		</plugins>
	</build>

Perfect! The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 has been successfully completed. Here's a summary of what was done:

## Summary of Changes

### 1. **Parent POM (pom.xml)**
   - Updated Java version from 1.8 to 17
   - Updated maven-compiler-plugin from 3.1 to 3.12.1 with source/target/release set to 17
   - Updated maven-release-plugin from 2.5.3 to 3.0.1
   - Updated all dependency versions to Java 17 compatible versions:
     - commons-lang3: 3.4 → 3.14.0
     - commons-math3: 3.5 → 3.6.1
     - commons-collections4: 4.1 → 4.4
     - commons-compress: 1.12 → 1.26.0
     - commons-io: 2.6 → 2.15.1
     - commons-cli: 1.3.1 → 1.6.0
     - guava: 19.0 → 33.0.0-jre
     - jackson-jaxrs-json-provider: 2.6.5 → 2.16.1
     - spark: 2.0.0 (Scala 2.11) → 3.5.0 (Scala 2.12)
     - hadoop: 2.7.3 → 3.3.6
     - opennlp-tools: 1.5.3 → 2.3.2
     - junit: 4.13.1 → 4.13.2

### 2. **Module-specific Updates**
   - **boilerpipe/nekohtml/pom.xml**: Updated maven-shade-plugin from 2.3 to 3.5.1 and nekohtml from 1.9.13 to 1.9.22
   - **boilerpipe/boilerpipe-common/pom.xml**: Updated xerces from 2.12.0 to 2.12.2
   - **com.ibm.research.ai.ki.kbp/pom.xml**: Updated fastutil from 7.1.0 to 8.5.12

### 3. **Code Changes**
   - **SaveCommonCrawlHdfs.java**: Fixed Hadoop 3.x compatibility by changing DistributedFileSystem reference from `.class.getName()` to string literal
   - **RelexTsvDataset.java**: Fixed Spark 3.x compatibility by replacing `org.spark_project.guava.collect` with `com.google.common.collect`

All modules now compile successfully with Java 17, and `mvn clean verify` passes successfully!
